IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviCounter Specific Instrument Driver
Class Specification version: 2.00
IVI Generation:		     IVI-2014
Group Capabilities Supported:

Base			= Supported
TimeIntervalStopHoldoff = Not Supported
Filter         		= Not Supported
VoltageMeasurement      = Supported
EdgeTimeReferenceLevels = Supported


Optional Features:
-----------------
State Caching 			= True
Interchangeability Checking 	= True
Coercion Recording 		= True


Driver Identification:
---------------------
Driver Revision:          1.2.1
Prefix:                   ag5313xni
Description:              AG53131A, AG53132A of Universal Counter

Driver Release Information:
--------------------------

Original Release Date:       16-DEC-2009
Update Release Date:         11-May-2015

Hardware Information:
--------------------

Instrument Manufacturer:      Agilent Technologies
Supported Instrument Models:  53131A, 53132A
Supported Bus Interfaces:     Serial, GPIB


32-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems: 		  Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista 32, Windows Vista 64, Windows 7 (32-bit), Windows 7 (64-bit),  Windows 8 (32-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit)

Unsupported Operating Systems:		  Windows 2000

Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1 or later, VISA 5.2 or later

Source Code Availability:                 Available


64-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems: 		  Windows Vista 64, Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit)

Unsupported Operating Systems:		  N/A

Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1 or later, VISA 5.2 or later

Source Code Availability:                 Available

Unit Testing
--------------------
Test Setup 1:
Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):    53132A(3703)
Bus Interface:                           GPIB
Operating System (Service Pack):         Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:          64-bit/32-bit
VISA Vendor and Version:                 NI-VISA 14.0
IVI Shared Components Version:           2.2.1



Driver Installation Testing:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):         Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                              64-bit



Driver Buildability:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):         Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                              64-bit



Driver Test Failures:
--------------------
Known Issues:                            None

Note:
National Instruments has evaluated and/or tested this driver to verify that it
meets all applicable requirements of the IVI specifications at the time this
compliance document was submitted to the IVI Foundation and agrees to abide by
the dispute arbitration provisions in Section 7 of IVI-1.2: Operating
Procedures, if the IVI Foundation finds this driver to be non-conformant.
